attributes.review: Downloaded it and was very excited to finally be apart of trump train. BUT THEN THE APP GLITCHED. It asked me if I was affiliated with Islam, poc, blacks, Hispanics, Asians, ANYONE FOREIGN!!! Of course the answer is yes ☺️ BUT IT RUINED MY PHONE COMPLETELY RUINED IT. Now there’s trump faces popping up. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED
